# Container Variants

This component supports the following appearances and variants. To apply them, use the corresponding class(es) on your widget.

---

## Appearance: Default

**Appearance Class:** `app-container-default`

---

## Appearance: Outlined

**Appearance Class:** `app-outlined-container`

---

## Appearance: Elevated

**Appearance Class:** `app-elevated-container`
